title: Building a Nation
subtle:
Historical (nonfiction), 2,431 words, Level Z2 (Grade 5+), Lexile 1090L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     Z and Z1
description: What happened after the thirteen colonies declared independence from Great Britain? Building a Nation is an informational book that is a continuation of Seeds of Revolution and Battling for Independence. The book can also be used to teach students how to analyze problem and solution and the proper use of compound adjectives. The book and lesson are also available for levels Z and Z1.
meta: amend, authority, checks and balances, compromise, constitution, debates, executive, judicial, incurred, legislative, prosperity, ratify, rebellion, representatives, republic, revenue, sovereign, tyranny
